channel.title: Noclip help
channel.description:
I'm using a 317 deltascape source and bluurr client, I was wondering if its possible to fix no-clipping. If so, how?
I'd really love some help. :)

item.title: Noclip help
item.dc:creator: @Pure_Demons Pure Demons
item.description:
@Pure_Demons wrote:

[quote=“xxlukexx, post:4, topic:324577”][quote author=05bgoodson link=topic=420954.msg3091969#msg3091969 date=1262968255]
add

&& playerRights >= 3

at end of the command, so it should look something like

[code]if (command.equalsIgnoreCase(“noclip”) && playerRights >= 3)

or to make it only a player with rights 3 only (this is normaly just an owner)
use:

if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("noclip") && playerRights == 3)

that should solve your problem! :)[/code]
[/quote]

why make it above 3, now adays, no one has hidden admins…[/quote]

Hidden Admins have Hidden Admin, weird huh? And, it doesn’t matter, he’s just trying to help, if you don’t like it then just make it

&& playerRights >= 2

Mmk?

Read full topic

item.title: Noclip help
item.dc:creator: @xxlukexx xxlukexx
item.description:
@xxlukexx wrote:

[quote=“05bgoodson, post:3, topic:324577”]add

&& playerRights >= 3

at end of the command, so it should look something like

[code]if (command.equalsIgnoreCase(“noclip”) && playerRights >= 3)

or to make it only a player with rights 3 only (this is normaly just an owner)
use:

if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("noclip") && playerRights == 3)

that should solve your problem! :)[/code][/quote]

why make it above 3, now adays, no one has hidden admins…

Read full topic

item.title: Noclip help
item.dc:creator: @05bgoodson 05bgoodson
item.description:
@05bgoodson wrote:

add

&& playerRights >= 3

at end of the command, so it should look something like

[code]if (command.equalsIgnoreCase(“noclip”) && playerRights >= 3)

or to make it only a player with rights 3 only (this is normaly just an owner)
use:

if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("noclip") && playerRights == 3)

that should solve your problem! :)[/code]

Read full topic

item.title: Noclip help

item.description:
@Fatal_Desire wrote:

Make the command (rights 3) Or put it where if its used it bans.

Read full topic
